Text: Anatomy (German: "Anatomie" ) is a 2000 German horror film written and directed by Stefan Ruzowitzky that stars Franka Potente.

Text: Anatomy (film):  The film was a box-office success in Germany, and Columbia Pictures released the film's English-dubbed version in the United States theatrically.
